value.stringValue: The Business_Assessment_Milestone_Change-3 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Business_Assessment_Milestone_Change-3, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Business_Assessment_Milestone_Change-3 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Business_Assessment_Milestone_Change-3, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

recordUpdates.name: myRule_4_A3
recordUpdates.label: Change assessment opp to stakeholder contribution
